ingredients.item: 400g can black beans, drained and rinsed
2 Waitrose Duchy Organic Little Gem Lettuce, shredded

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Brush the tortillas with a little oil on both sides, cut each into 8 wedges and lay out in a single layer on a large baking tray. Bake for 5-6 minutes until golden and crisp. Allow to cool.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, mix the beans with the baby corn, cos and gem lettuce, avocado, onion and tomatoes.
Whisk together the chipotle paste, lime zest and juice, and remaining olive oil. Season and toss into the salad. Serve with the tortilla chips.
